      • persistenceStrategy

        @Optional
Property<net.sf.ehcache.config.PersistenceConfiguration.Strategy> persistenceStrategy()
        Cache Persistence Strategy. Can be:
        • LOCALTEMPSWAP: Standard open source (non fault-tolerant) on-disk persistence.
        • LOCALRESTARTABLE: Enterprise fault tolerant persistence.
        • NONE: No persistence.
        • DISTRIBUTED: Terracotta clustered persistence (requires a Terracotta clustered cache).
        Defaults to NONE.

      • maxElementsInMemory

        @Optional
@UseDefaults
Property<Integer> maxElementsInMemory()
        Number of objects the ehCache should keep in memory. Defaults to 1000
        Returns:
        The maximum number of elements to be kept in memory.
